divs: sighting detailscomment on your sighting on 9\27\11 - moving objects in sky for 7 nights. i have been a ufo researcher for 52 years and have studied the sky intensely as an amateur astronomer. i have located about 5 to 6 false stars - these eject orbs, the orbs go on a mission, then return to the larger craft. the larger craft move around quickly to gather the orbs upon returning. these larger objects are most likely motherships - ejecting orbs in the west, south, & east of my location 25 miles outside phila. they do stop moving when an aircraft nears, although these craft must be much higher in the atmosphere. i can see them with the naked eye due to practice. their quick movements to assist in the capture of orbs is easily noticeable with a little practice. i refer to them as false stars since they mimic stars to avoid detection. hope this helps.
Summary: Comment about report submitted 9/28/2011 from Mo.,US about multiple starlike objects moving eratically.
